About.Hours & facilities: Open Tues, Wed & Fri 9am-3pm or by appointment. General reference assistance available.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit by letter or by telephone required. Access restricted to all official records, except with authorisation of Headmistress.

About.Acquisition focus: All School records - especially from ex-staff; memorabilia and uniforms from ex-pupils.

About.Major holdings: SCEGGS Council/Board: Minutes, reports, letters etc 1894- (60ft); Records 1945-1976 (30ft). Headmistresses: Reports 1895- . Staff: Records 1895- ; Educational Department: Records (eg Sport, Drama etc) 1895- ; Pupils: School register, records 1895- . Collection of uniforms: Museum 1900- (30ft). Correspondence from old girls/ex staff: Letters 1900- (15ft). Museum: Furniture etc. Memorabilia Collection: Books written by old girls, memoirs etc.

About.References: Reports in all of the following: SCEGGS Staff Year Book; SCEGGS Lux Annual (school magazine); SCEGGS Old Girls Union Newsletter; SCEGGS Trust Magazines.

Contact.Note: Former: Sydney Church of England Girls' Grammar School
